name: How Fish is Made (itch)
description:
If sardines have taught us anything, it’s that some living things were made to be eaten.

In How Fish is Made you are a sardine in a machine, but is life that simple? This place imposes on you and your fellow fish a prophetic choice. Will you help them, or lead them astray? Will they do the same to you?

Live through the power fantasy of being a sardine. Make oily friends, become upset and choose your destiny. 

The sardines look just like the real thing, so you can really believe they have emotions. Guaranteed! 

⇝ A wet & squalid narrative-driven horror game about choice.

⇝ A multitude of interesting & worldly characters to interact with. Warning! They may take your careless words to heart.

⇝ A musical epic spawning philosophy, consumer education and self-love.

FOLLOW for updates on future projects: ⇝ Johanna Kasurinen - Narrative Design, Level Design & Art Assets  @byKASURAGA ⇝ Martin Halldin - Sound Design & Audio Programmer  @siarate ⇝ Jeffrey Tomec - Technical design, Shaders & Programming  @Jeffrey_Tomec ⇝⇝⇝⇝⇝ Features the original song "Little Lily Swing" by Tri-Tachyon ALL MUSIC IN THIS GAME IS STREAMING AND YOUTUBE SAFE.
